channel.title: Help plz!
channel.description: i have satan's isle v.1 and there is a glitch were when u have a weapon on and try and put boots on the boots go on were weapon was and the weapon goes to the invo plz help i wanna get rid of this glitch :D

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @monkey12 monkey12
item.description:

i have got rid of glitch and now i can wair infinaty boots and whip together and they go in right slots =)

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @muskiejk muskiejk
item.description:
@muskiejk wrote:

go into item.java and find those boots item ids they should be somewhere in the wepon section cause its considered a wepon so take the boots id out of the wepon section and put it in the botts section simple o and by section i mean these things public static int weapons[] so thats it save compile run

Read full topic

item.title: Help plz!
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

have you tested all the boots? because sometimes it can just be a set of boots…etc. if its all boots do that then…check in item about where the item goes when its put on…i dont know the exact place. but try checking item and client.jav for the item and try and change stuff. lol guess and check with stuff like this. thats my best tip.
